member.name: T:Labradoratory.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.Patchable.PatchableAttribute

member.name: T:Labradoratory.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.Patchable.PatchableCollectionAttribute
member.summary: Marks a property as having children that are patchable, while not itself being patchable.
member.remarks: This attribute can be used to allow the contents of a collection or the child properties of an object to be patched, while blocking the actual object from being replaced or deleted as part of a patch.
